product_name: REI Powerflyte Full-Zip Hoodie - Women's - 2012 Overstock
long_description: Soft, lightweight and warm, the women's REI Powerflyte full-zip hoodie features moisture-wicking, quick-drying stretch fleece that's perfect for cool-weather training, trail running and hiking. Lightweight fleece features a moisture-wicking, quick-drying brushed inner face and a smooth outer face. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Comfortable hood doesn't inhibit movement and feels snug without the use of drawcords. Ergonomic seam placement, flat seams and fabric with 4-way stretch complement your natural movements. Two zippered pockets shelter your hands; full-length zipper offers cooling ventilation when the day heats up. The REI Powerflyte full-zip hoodie features reflective highlights to increase visibility in dim light. Overstock.
short_description: Soft, lightweight and warm, the women's REI Powerflyte full-zip hoodie features moisture-wicking, quick-drying stretch fleece that's perfect for cool-weather training, trail running and hiking.
